#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int _lis( int arr[], int n )
{
   int lis[100], i, j, max = 0;
   
   for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
      lis[i] = 1;
   
   for ( i = 1; i < n; i++ )
      for ( j = 0; j < i; j++ )
         if ( arr[i] > arr[j] && lis[i] < lis[j] + 1)
            lis[i] = lis[j] + 1;
 
   for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
      if ( max < lis[i] )
         max = lis[i];

   return max;
}

int main() 
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
 {
 int n;
 cin>>n;
 int a[n],i;
 for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    cin>>a[i];
 int max = _lis(a,n);
 cout<<max<<endl;
 }
return 0;
}
